courses: Trading and Market Microstructure, Machine Learning, Data Modelling, Private Equity

details.program: Bachelor of Business Administration in Business Design and Innovation

details.position: Intern, IT Financials and Asset Management
key_achievements: Pioneered internal process automation project by replacing manual processes such as invoice approval, periodic emails and record keeping with power automate flows. Sped up procurement and license assignment by 30% for over 800 users across 10 office locations and eliminated untraceable procurement tickets.

Enabled financial metrics visibility of corporate IT department such as asset allocation, depreciation and monthly budget. Provided financial insight to a buyout analysis of over 300k USD for director-level decision-making during company M&A

Developed IT strategy in software licensing management by structuralizing tasks by event triggers, and storing data centrally on ITAM tool (Asset Sonar). Sped up approval process, automated assignment process, optimized inventory, and reduced non-compliance entitlements.

Executed asset management activities such as lease negotiation, tenant onboarding and arrears management. Maintained occupancy of over 99% among 6 properties of over 260k sqm NLA with notable tenants such as Adidas, UPS and Swatch

Restructured leasing process by integrating tasks using excel tools such as query, Marcos and database linkages. Eliminated data input redundancy and accelerated renewal and termination processes by over 50%.
Constructed yearly budget by projecting current year performance and extracting rent schedule information. Figures and forecast produced were used in the company annual report
Served in the sustainability committee and designed workshops and initiatives for coworkers in Hong Kong Office. 8 activities were planned such as upcycling workshops, hikes and museum tours

Collaborated with major industry players (FedEx, DHL, UPS etc.) to provide a one-stop online international courier platform for corporate clients. Notable clients: Art Incubator (PMQ), largest youth non-profit organization in Hong Kong (HKFYG), Edifier

Developed and standardized sales process, including lead generation. Customer profiling, and sales automation. Collaborated with marketing team for sales pitch creation, and with operation team to deliver after-sales service
Achieved over $1M HKD sales in 5 months and increase client base by 50%.

Generated 65K Eur Sales in 1 year selling imported office furniture to A-grade office tenant such as Baker Mckenzie, Davidoff, and Tiffany &Co. Produced new use cases including luxury retail and restaurants

Coordinated with design firms such as Goudie, Richards Basmajian and property managers such as JLL and CBRE for project design and procurement. Built relationship through weekly client visits and providing lunch & learn sessions
Gained 500 connections through cold-calling and referral. Promoted the brand through service pitch and job inquiries.
Provided design furniture leasing service in Art Basel HK 2018. Coordinated with over 200 galleries in the 5-day event, from order taking to CRM service
Improved online channel to drive traffic, brand impression and visitor engagement with targeted content and simpler UI
